## BaseModelController.dtoClass property

The frontend DTO class which extends [BaseFrontendDTO](./clm-core.basefrontenddto.md)<!-- -->. It is used to only show a subset of attributes when fetching for resources

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dtoClass: new (params: any) => FDTO;
```
